title: Looking for Fun player to join our shit little group ( not for the serious player)
body:
TLDR= Me and the mates are looking for someone else to play with that can put up with shenanigan's and tom foolery

 
Ok so me and my mates are looking for more people to play with.
Please note half the time we tend to not give any shits and just focus on the idea of having fun.
Please have skype so we can all yell at eachother and blame others for our own acitons.
We like to smoke in between games so if that bothers ya im sorry xD.

replies.body: i must say, i was simply delighted to hear such enlightening news. i would simply cherish the idea of playing with people that aren't little shits.
I sure hope you understand what youre getting youself into :333333333333

> [{quoted}](name=TouchMyKimchi,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=9KrrJBYu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-14T01:33:18.880+0000)
>
> How old are you scumbags?

old enough to be your grandaddy

That's rather old, as they both passed away over 20 years ago.
You cool kid.

and you're soo smart aren't acting like you run the place.... you cant just talk like that its disrespectful to the lord the lord jesus your father your god who is truly your 'grandaddy' as he drinks from your wine and bonds with your spirit it is he who is the cool kid.
